medium: Pen, brown ink and brown wash heightened with white on brown prepared paper
creditline: Gift of Frank Jewett Mather Jr.

texts.textentryhtml: Poynter sale April 1918, no. 150 (according to old mat note); gift of Frank Jewett Mather, Jr., but not stamped with his mark
